startUrls.title: Starting URLs
startUrls.description: Enter links such as movie/tv show details (for example https://www.rottentomatoes.com/tv/the_office) or links with filters from here: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/browse.

maxResults.title: Maximum number of results
maxResults.description: Limit the number of movies/tv shows to scrape

proxyConfig.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfig.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.
